issue_name: Multiple File Parsing Vulnerabilities in Simcenter Femap

1.command: Update to V2406 or later version
1.description: Siemens has released a new version for Simcenter Femap and recommends updating to the latest version.

1.command: Do not open untrusted IGS files
1.description: Avoid opening untrusted IGS files in the affected applications to mitigate the risk.

2.command: Do not open untrusted BDF files
2.description: Avoid opening untrusted BDF files in the affected applications to mitigate the risk.

3.command: Do not open untrusted BMP files
3.description: Avoid opening untrusted BMP files in the affected applications to mitigate the risk.

4.command: Do not open untrusted IGS, BDF or BMP files
4.description: Avoid opening untrusted IGS, BDF, or BMP files using Simcenter Femap to mitigate the risk.
